    • Field Detail

      • CREATOR

        public static final android.os.Parcelable.Creator<CameraPosition> CREATOR

      • bearing

        public final float bearing
        Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north.

      • target

        public final LatLng target
        The location that the camera is pointing at.

      • tilt

        public final float tilt
        The angle, in degrees, of the camera angle from the nadir (directly facing the Earth). See tilt(float) for details of restrictions on the range of values.

      • zoom

        public final float zoom
        Zoom level near the center of the screen. See zoom(float) for the definition of the camera's zoom level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraPosition

        public CameraPosition(LatLng target,
              float zoom,
              float tilt,
              float bearing)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a CameraPosition.
        Parameters:
        target - The target location to align with the center of the screen.
        zoom - Zoom level at target. See zoom(float) for details of restrictions.
        tilt - The camera angle, in degrees, from the nadir (directly down). See tilt(float) for details of restrictions.
        bearing - Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north. This value will be normalized to be within 0 degrees inclusive and 360 degrees exclusive.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if target is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if tilt is outside the range of 0 to 90 degrees inclusive.
